Question
========

Inferential statistics is about making a decision about one or more several

Answerlist
----------

* Populations based on one or more samples.
* Samples based on one or more populations.
* Samples assuming one or more populations are well sampled.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Populations based on one or more samples...: Correct
* Samples based on one or more populations...: Incorrect
* Sampling assuming one or more populations are well sampled...: Incorrect
